name: Isler - Island Builder - V0.01
description:
Hey! Welcome to the initials versions of the prototype about my game ideia "Island Builder". 

I had one project in mind and i am placing the game here to get some help in evolving my concept into something cool. Basically the ideia is a roguelike/lite where the player spawn on a simple island with a builder character. That builder is used to build other adjacent islands and continue to explore the world. The game will have enemies to fight and bosses to discover.

--------------------------------------- C O N T R O L S -----------------------------------------------

Moving player: A W S D

Dash : Space Bar

Attack: Right Mouse and the attack will face the mouse direction

-------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------

My concept is still in the very beginning but i am posting here so that i get help with ideias and transform them into a fun and playable game. If you have something in mind that would fit good in this game feel free to share it :D

What i have in mind right now:

- When the builder is building an island, enemies will spawn and the player have to protect the builder.

- I will create a second enemy that shoots spear and a third one that breaths fire.

- With the number of islands the builder creates, enemies will spawn in waves.

- Enemies have a chance to appear on the spawned islands.

-Some islands will have dungeons and tresures to find.

-The player will get resorces from the islands (wood,rocks,etc) to build houses and equipment to improve the player stats.

-Spawning islands require energy

This is just the prototype so i can see if the game would be fun and if is it worth to invest the time to build it.

What i am strugle with is with ideias xD

--------------------------------------- | | --------------------------------------------------------

Last Updates: 

- Added a Unity asset store model to my player so it doesnt look like a cilinder

- Added movement animations and a "dark souls like" dask

- Added a simple slime enemy with simple AI and basic attack system
